metadata.title: Prince Alwaleed bin Talal | Investor & Philanthropist
metadata.description: Official website of Prince Alwaleed bin Talal - global investor, philanthropist, and advocate for sustainable development.

welcome.title: A Legacy of Innovation and Impact
welcome.description: For over five decades, Prince Alwaleed has dedicated his career to identifying transformative investment opportunities and supporting communities across 190 countries. From founding Kingdom Holding Company to joining the Giving Pledge, his journey reflects a commitment to creating lasting value and positive change.

investments.title: Investments
investments.description: Strategic investments across 18 sectors including technology, hospitality, finance, and media.

philanthropy.title: Philanthropy
philanthropy.description: Alwaleed Philanthropies reaches 190+ countries, focusing on empowerment, disaster relief, and bridging cultures.

vision.title: Vision 2030
vision.description: Contributing to Saudi Arabia's transformation through strategic investments and social development initiatives.

cta.title: Join the Conversation
cta.description: Share your story, explore Prince Alwaleed's work, or connect with the team.

earlyLife.title: Early Life and Royal Lineage
earlyLife.content: Born on March 7, 1955, into the esteemed Saudi royal family, Prince Alwaleed is the grandson of King Abdulaziz, the visionary founder of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. His father, Prince Talal bin Abdulaziz, was known as a progressive reformer who championed social development and modernization. His mother, Princess Mona El Solh, daughter of Lebanon's first Prime Minister Riad El Solh, brought a unique international perspective to his upbringing.

education.title: Education
education.content: Prince Alwaleed pursued his education in the United States, earning a degree in Business Administration from Menlo College in California, followed by a Master's degree in Social Science from Syracuse University. These formative years abroad provided him with a global outlook that would later shape his approach to business and philanthropy.

career.title: Career and Business Ventures
career.content: In 1980, Prince Alwaleed founded Kingdom Holding Company with modest capital and a bold vision. Through strategic investments in undervalued companies and sectors poised for growth, he built an empire spanning finance, technology, hospitality, media, and real estate. His approach has always been to seek long-term value creation aligned with positive societal impact.

values.title: Personal Values
values.content: Beyond business, Prince Alwaleed is committed to progressive values, philanthropy, and social development. His passion for women's empowerment, interfaith dialogue, and sustainable development has driven countless initiatives aimed at creating a more equitable world.

accomplishments.title: Accomplishments
accomplishments.subtitle: Building a Global Investment Empire
accomplishments.intro: Through Kingdom Holding Company, Prince Alwaleed has built strategic positions across 18 sectors, from technology giants to luxury hospitality, always seeking investments that combine financial returns with positive impact.

finance.title: Finance
finance.description: Major stakeholder in Citigroup since 1991, playing a pivotal role in stabilizing global banking during critical periods.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: Early investor in transformative platforms including Apple, X (Twitter), Snapchat, xAI, Meta, and Uber.

hospitality.title: Hospitality
hospitality.description: Owner of iconic properties including The Savoy, The Plaza, George V, and Four Seasons hotels worldwide.

media.title: Media
media.description: Founded Rotana Group, the largest entertainment company in the Middle East, and invested in 21st Century Fox and News Corp.

realEstate.title: Real Estate
realEstate.description: Developer of Jeddah Tower through Jeddah Economic Company, pioneering the future of urban infrastructure.

saudiContribution.title: Contributing to Saudi Arabia's Development
saudiContribution.content: Prince Alwaleed's investments have played a vital role in Saudi Arabia's economic transformation, creating thousands of jobs, developing major infrastructure, and supporting Vision 2030's objectives to diversify the economy beyond oil.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Global Recognition and Impact
achievements.intro: Awards and recognition are humbling reminders of responsibility. Each honor represents not just past achievements, but future commitments to the communities and causes that matter most.

humanitarian.title: Humanitarian Recognition
items: Order of the Republic - Multiple Nations

diplomacy.title: International Diplomacy
diplomacy.content: Through strategic investments and philanthropic initiatives, Prince Alwaleed has worked to build bridges between nations and foster interfaith dialogue, contributing to global peace and understanding.

family.title: Family
family.subtitle: Heritage and Legacy
family.intro: Prince Alwaleed is the product of three remarkable lineages: his grandfather King Abdulaziz's vision for Saudi Arabia, his father Prince Talal's commitment to reform, and his mother's family's dedication to Arab independence and democracy.

grandfather.name: King Abdulaziz Al Saud
grandfather.role: Founder of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
grandfather.description: United disparate tribes into one sovereign nation, laying the foundation for modern Saudi Arabia.

father.name: Prince Talal bin Abdulaziz
father.description: Champion of social development, modernization, and economic progress in the Kingdom.

mother.name: Princess Mona El Solh
mother.description: Daughter of Riad El Solh, Lebanon's first Prime Minister, bringing international perspective to the family.

nextGeneration.title: The Next Generation
nextGeneration.content: Prince Alwaleed's children continue the family legacy of leadership and service. Princess Reem and Prince Khaled bin Alwaleed carry forward these values through their own philanthropic and business endeavors, including Prince Khaled's role as Chairman of the Saudi Sports for All Federation.

philanthropy.title: Philanthropy
philanthropy.subtitle: Alwaleed Philanthropies
philanthropy.intro: Wealth carries responsibility. Through Alwaleed Philanthropies, the foundation has reached over 190 countries, impacting more than 1 billion lives. In 2015, Prince Alwaleed became the first Arab Muslim to join the Giving Pledge, committing the majority of his wealth to charitable causes.

empowerment.title: Empowering Women & Youth
empowerment.description: Funding scholarships, entrepreneurship programs, and leadership initiatives to create opportunities for the next generation.

community.title: Developing Communities
community.description: Building infrastructure, providing housing, and supporting sustainable development in underserved communities.

disaster.title: Disaster Relief
disaster.description: Rapid response funding for natural disasters and humanitarian crises worldwide.

culture.title: Bridging Cultures
culture.description: Supporting interfaith dialogue and cultural understanding through endowments at leading universities.

givingPledge.title: The Giving Pledge
givingPledge.content: In 2015, Prince Alwaleed joined Warren Buffett and Bill Gates' Giving Pledge, becoming the first Arab Muslim to make this commitment. This wasn't a new direction—it was a public formalization of a lifelong commitment inspired by his grandfather's principle that leadership means service.

contact.intro: Throughout Prince Alwaleed's journey, he has been privileged to meet remarkable people from every corner of the world. This space is for visitors to share how their paths have crossed, or how his work has touched their lives or communities.
